rows.label: qev090802_MSG0001
rows.name: Nnh... Aaah...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0002
rows.name: H-help... Please help. Blood-king...still hungry...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0003
rows.name: Dodonga Caravan...next target...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0004
rows.name: Nrgh...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0005
rows.name: [ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0006
rows.name: He's gone... We couldn't save even one of them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0007
rows.name: We should hurry to that caravan.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0008
rows.name:
I'll not permit another fragile life
to be snuffed out by this...monster![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_JNK0010
rows.name: Agree

rows.label: qev090802_SEL0011
rows.name: Tell H.B. that you're just as angry as he is.

rows.label: qev090802_JNK0020
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev090802_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask H.B. why he's becoming so emotional.

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0009
rows.name:
Anger? Yes, I suppose I got emotional there.
Not like me, I know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0010
rows.name: I blame it on your bad influence.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0011
rows.name:
Come now, I'm as human as the next man.
I don't want to lose anyone if it can be helped.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0012
rows.name:
But I also know that's not realistic,
so I force myself to stay rational. Cold.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0013
rows.name: But since you're the only one here to see me...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0014
rows.name: I'm sorry. Forgive me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0015
rows.name:
I'll be back to my usual self by the time
we catch up to the blood-king.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev090802_MSG0016
rows.name: We'll complete the mission with our usual precision.[ST:wait ]
